xxl.core.relational.query.expressions
Class Columns

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.relational.query.expressions.Columns

public class Columns
extends Object

This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a column node in a directed acyclic graph. Beside these methods, it contains constants for identifying local metadata fragments inside an expression node's global metadata, methods for accessing them and local metadata factories for updating them.

See Also:
Node

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ANCHOR_PLACEMENT_STRATEGY

public static final Function<Node,?> ANCHOR_PLACEMENT_STRATEGY
An anchor placement strategy for column expressions. The strategy simply addes the anchor as a local metadata fragment to the column expression's global metadata.

COLUMN_INDEX_METADATA_FACTORY

public static final Function<Object,Integer> COLUMN_INDEX_METADATA_FACTORY
A local metadata factory that can be used to update the metadata fragment holding a child index. It returns the metadata fragment stored in the node's global metadata when it exists or creates a new metadata fragment based on the available child nodes and the column name otherwise.

COLUMN_METADATA_FACTORY

public static final Function<Object,ResultSetMetaDataColumnMetaData> COLUMN_METADATA_FACTORY
A local metadata factory that can be used to create/update the metadata fragment describing the column.

XML_READER

public static final Function<Object,Node> XML_READER
A factory method that can be used to transform the XML representation of a column expression into the node itself.

XML_WRITER

public static final Function<Object,Node> XML_WRITER
A factory method that can be used to transform a column expression into its XML representation.

TRANSLATION_FUNCTION

public static final Function<Object,MetaDataFunction<Tuple,? extends Object,CompositeMetaData<Object,Object>>> TRANSLATION_FUNCTION
A factory method that can be used to translate a column expression into an appropriate implementation.

newColumn

public static final Node newColumn(int childIndex,
                                   int columnIndex)
Creates a new column expression representing the columnIndex-th column of the childIndex-th child of the expression's anchor node.

Parameters:
childIndex - the index of the expression's anchor node's child containing the column.
columnIndex - the index of the column.
Returns:
a new column expression representing the columnIndex-th column of the childIndex-th child of the expression's anchor node.

                                   String tableName,
                                   String columnName)
Creates a new column expression representing the column named schemaName.tableName.columnName of the expression's anchor node's children.

Parameters:
schemaName - the name of the schema providing the column's table.
tableName - the name of the table containing the column.
columnName - the name of the column.
Returns:
a new column expression representing the column named schemaName.tableName.columnName of the expression's anchor node's children.

getColumnIndexFactory

public static final Function<ResultSetMetaData,Integer> getColumnIndexFactory(Node expression)
Returns a factory method for coumn indices using the schema, table and column name of the column represented by the given column expression inside the relational metadata of the anchor node's child.

Parameters:
expression - the column expression whose column index should be resolved by the return factory method.
Returns:
a factory method for coumn indices using the schema, table and column name of the column represented by the given column expression inside the relational metadata of the anchor node's child.
